name: Going Out Fishing
description:
Going Out Fishing.  We are still adding some more polishing to the game, but now this game is done, well, only first version. 

Going Out Fishing is an arcade / adventure fishing game. Buy baits, fish, sell the fish you caught, explore and listen to amazing and relaxing sounds - the possibilities are endless!

The official trailer - https://bit.ly/3ulQtpM

The official WebSite - https://going-out-fishing.jimdosite.com/

Current version - v.1

Things coming to new version: Bigger Map, Village, Boat, Awesome Lights, Day/Night cycle.
